patthana21.46:1.1: Naāsavaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noāsavo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
patthana21.46:2.1: Nanoāsavaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noāsavo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.46:3.1: Noāsavaṁ naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Purimanayena tīṇi pañhā.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… aññamaññe ekaṁ …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.46:4.1: Noāsavaṁ naanidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noāsavo anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
